# packages

```{r}
library(data.table) 
library(tidyverse) 
require(stringi)
require(Rsiena)
require(igraph)

```
# Data

```{r}
#load dataobjects
load("./data/soc_net_array.RData")
```

# degrees 

```{r}
net3 <- net_soc_array[ ,, 3]
diag(net3) <- 0
degree <- rowSums(net3)
hist(degree)

```


# igraph object 
```{r}
net3_g <- igraph::graph_from_adjacency_matrix(net3, mode = c("undirected"))
plot(net3_g)

igraph::degree(net3_g)
igraph::dyad.census(net3_g)
igraph::triad.census(net3_g)
igraph::edge_density(net3_g)
```
